item.title: Play With Git (ä¸€)
item.description: How to: Remove large file in git problem description i have a git repository in github, it is kindof 20M at the most.but when i try to clone it to my local machine, it takes 10 min to clone the repository. That is wired. so i start to check the git file, and i find some big file out there. i check with a script to list the big file
